events.name: onPeerConnectionRequest
events.description: This event fires whenever there is a request to establish a new peer connection.  If the blocking flag is true, the return value from the event handler may be used to allow or deny the request

events.name: onPeerConnectionRequestCancel
events.description: This event fires when a previous peer connection request is canceled.

events.name: onMediaPermissions
events.description: This event fires after the user responds to the prompt displayed when getUserMedia() is called.

camera.description: Was permission granted for the camera

microphone.description: Was permission granted for the microphone
